channel.title: Need help for 667/718/728 base
channel.description: Hey guys so I'm about to start coding my first rsps and would like to make it 667/718. At first, I was going to use Zenith as my base server but then i saw many people saying it is a bad base. Anyone has any suggestions for a base? If so please leave a comment and a link if possible :)

item.title: Need help for 667/718/728 base
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

We’re not really here to help you pick a source (Sorry).

You essentially just have to go find one and try it… if you like it, use it. If you don’t, remove it and try another…

If you have no knowledge of Java, then you should start with learning it, and how to use IDEs:

Java Tutorials by Oracle
Every tutorial by Oracle
Java API documentation
Eclipse IDE or One of the alternatives (People tend to favor IDEA’s now)
How to start a server
Load RSPS in Eclipse

Read full topic
